description: Situated in a building with a striking appearance (the Uruguay Pavilion in Expo 2015), this restaurant boasts stunning views of the mountains in the distance. Inside, the large dining room acts as a backdrop for South American cuisine with a focus on grilled specialities. A simple atmosphere and friendly service add to the appeal.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
